short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: *ALPHA VERSION* Save your code snippets across devices using Google cloud storage!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Code Saver lets you save snippets of code and access them from any computer where you are signed into Chrome.

-----------------------------------------
*** Early Alpha Version. ***
-----------------------------------------

The only way to really test syncing across devices is to publish to the store. Right now syncing is not working but a fix is in the works and should be implemented soon!

Expect bugs. View the project page at https://github.com/Deftwun/codesaver..
